name: GrandPix Racing (Martynyuu)
description:
Play in Browser

downloadable version recommended for best sound and performance

18 Opponents from around the world racing for the Grand Pixel trophy. 

Can you make it to the first 3 or will you go home with nothing? 

Incredible Physics for intense collisions guaranteed!

Controls:

Arrow keys Left and Right to move Left and right.

Arrow keys Up and Down to accelerate or decelerate.

Music by Daniel Kim
